cards.title: Replic-8 Vat
body: When a Scientist is destroyed, reveal cards from the top of the Environment deck until a Dragon is put into play, and discard the rest, then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: And there it was, Replic-8, glowing like{BR}a nightlight in the dark room.{BR}{Dragontamer} shuddered as she{BR}the CEO falling in.

cards.title: The Chameleon
body: {Chameleon} is immune to damage during the Environment turn.
At the end of the Environment turn, this card deals the non-Dragon target with the highest HP 3 Melee damage.

cards.title: The Raptor
body: At the start of the Environment turn, this card deals the non-Dragon target with the lowest HP X Melee damage, where X is the number of Dragons in play.

cards.title: Dr. Klaws
body: At the start of the Environment turn, this card deals each non-Environment target 1 Sonic damage

flavorQuotes.text: He's kept me sane down here

cards.flavorText: “He's kept me sane down here,” said Dr.{BR}Klaus, petting the larger raptor sitting{BR}next to him.

cards.title: Research Handler
body: At the End of the Environment turn, this card deals the Dragon with the lowest HP 1 Lightning damage.
Targets dealt damage by {ResearchHandler} cannot deal damage until the start of the next Environment turn.
cards.flavorText: The scientists advanced slowly on the{BR}escaped dragon, the loud taser crackles{BR}scaring him backword.

cards.title: Dr. Fauna
body: At the start of the Environment turn, Dr. Fauna deals the Non-Scientist target with the lowest HP 2 Psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: She had a formidible presence, clearly{BR}the reason OnceAgain was still a problem

cards.title: Dr. Klaus
body: Increase damage dealt to Villain targets by Environment targets by 1.
Decrease damage dealt to Hero targets by Environment targets by 1
At the end of the Environment Turn, both Dr. Klaus and Dr. Klaws, if he is in play, regain 1 HP
cards.flavorText: He was quiet, perhaps a bit shy. Clearly{BR}he was the reason it took OnceAgain this{BR}long to be a problem.

cards.title: Specimen Container
body: When this card enters play, put the non-Character target other than a Specimen Containment under this card.
If there is no target to put under this, destroy it and play the top card of the Environment deck.
When this card is destroyed, put any cards under it back in play.

cards.title: Destroy the Evidence
body: Destroy all copies of Replic-8 Vat. This card deals each target X Fire damage where X equals 2 plus the number of cards destroyed this way.
cards.flavorText: Soon it was all on fire, every vat{BR}ignited, the paperwork all char.
